title: A Halfling Halloween Special: Part One
itunes:title: A Halfling Halloween Special: Part One
description:
Count Strahd von Zarovich cordially invites thespians Mr Jasper William Cartwright and Mr Jeremy Cobb, along with their band of players, to his residency Castle Ravenloft in the village of Barovia, to honour the Count with a one-off theatrical display.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Count Strahd von Zarovich cordially invites thespians Mr Jasper William Cartwright and Mr Jeremy Cobb, along with their band of players, to his residency Castle Ravenloft in the village of Barovia, to honour the Count with a one-off theatrical display.
